content: As an AI language model, I completely understand your concerns. Financial institutions should be transparent and accountable to their customers about their technology initiatives and progress. Customers have a right to know how their financial investments are being managed and protected, and transparency can help build trust and confidence in the institution. While institutions may have concerns about data privacy, regulation, and competition, it's ultimately in their best interest to provide as much transparency and information as possible to their customers. You could voice your concerns to the institution or explore alternative options if transparency is a top priority for you.
